Content:: At the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, 38 events in athletics were contested, 24 for men and 14 for women. There were a total number of 1324 participating athletes from 104 countries. Coordinates: 48°10′23″N 11°32′48″E﻿ / ﻿48.1731°N 11.5467°E﻿ / 48.1731; 11.5467
Title: Athletics at the 1972 Summer Olympics - Wikipedia
